txt.en: You have collected the treasure-boxes and eliminated many of Kheledûl's Dourhand occupants. Now you must get to the Irestone, the ship preparing to take Avorthal to an unknown port in the north.
'We must hurry, [placeholder]. Skorgrím has assembled an army of goblins within Rath Teraig. I fear that the goblin-army will not long remain within that narrow pass.\n\n'We must return now.'
Avorthal is on the deck of the Irestone, still docked at Kheledûl. You should free Avorthal.
\qAt least I fell... on the deck of my ship....\q

Avorthal is being held on the Irestone, the ship docked at the port-city of Kheledûl.\n\nUnless you free him tonight, the Irestone will carry Avorthal far from rescue and doom Ered Luin to war between dwarves and Elves.

The Dourhands control the port-city of Kheledûl, where Avorthal will soon be taken aboard a ship destined northward. This Dourhand stronghold is also where boxes of treasure stolen from the Longbeards by the Dourhands are stored.

'You are here to free me? Skorgrím Dourhand has raised a goblin army in the cleft of Rath Teraig, and unless we stop him, he will sweep through all the free lands!

'There is no time to waste, my friend. We will need to defeat the Captain and his crew if we are to escape from Kheledûl with our lives and bring word of the danger which grows stronger within Rath Teraig!

'The Captain will soon return. Quickly, untie my hands! We need to escape from here!'

Avorthal, the Elf-prince of Celondim, has been captured by goblins and handed over to wicked Dourhand dwarves. He has been moved from the Dourhand encampment to the port-city of Kheledûl, where he will soon be taken aboard a ship destined northward and beyond all hope of rescue.
